title: Bobby Confesses To His Girlfriend + Amy’s Extravagant Mother's Day Request + Do Tim McGraw's Daughters Think He’s Cool?
itunes:title: Bobby Confesses To His Girlfriend + Amy’s Extravagant Mother's Day Request + Do Tim McGraw's Daughters Think He’s Cool?
description:
Bobby confessed to doing something to his girlfriend when he wakes up in the middle of the night. Amy talks about how much alone time she wants for herself on Mother’s Day. Plus, we talk to Tim McGraw about his new song, his awesome pool and whether or not his daughters think he's cool!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
